forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, today unfolds under a serene embrace of sunshine, offering a gentle contrast to the cool, crisp air. While the forecast predicts a high near 64, the temperature is expected to retreat to about 62 as the afternoon progresses, yet the refreshing westerly winds add an invigorating touch, rustling leaves and stirring the atmosphere. This morning’s visibility appears clear, hinting that the usual veil of fog may linger to the west and not encroach upon the city itself, creating a rare moment to bask in the sunlight and appreciate the architectural beauty of the skyline, unmarred by the marine layer.

As the evening drapes its cloak over the city, expect a gradual shift to partly cloudy skies, wrapping around the low of 56 that invites a comfortable yet slightly chillier disposition. Dress accordingly, perhaps layering a light jacket over a simple tee, as the winds may tease a bit more chill into the night. Given these inviting conditions, a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero or a stop at an outdoor café could allow you to relish this pleasant day, absorbing the sounds of urban life melded with the gentle breeze. Opportunities abound amidst this nearly perfect day to engage with the vibrant life of the city or find solitude in nature’s embraces at one of the many nearby parks.
